title: Heart beat rages without your notice.
review: Thrilling. The engines roar and your heart pounds. Excellent acting by Chris nolan and Matt. Outstanding making of the movie.

title: Just average and boring.
review: The making is just bad and pretty boring. Not sure in what dimension ppl think to like it. If you are capable to tolerate such a movie and still appreciate it (I would say you are blessed with a strong mind) , well, first go back home to tolerate and understand your loved ones heart on. This will improve our life and relationships for good.
